long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turn the web into a global village with QuickTranslate, the must-have Chrome extension for seamless and instant translations. Whether you're a world traveler, a language enthusiast, or simply in need of quick language assistance, QuickTranslate empowers you to break down language barriers at the click of a mouse. It supports 135 languages.
